text: Ceylon competed at the 1956 Summer Olympics in Melbourne, Australia. == Athletics== High jump *Nagalingam Ethirveerasingam **Finals ==Boxing== * Chandrasena Jayasuriya * Hempala Jayasuriya ==References== * Official Olympic Reports * Sri Lanka at the 1956 Melbourne Summer Games Category:Nations at the 1956 Summer Olympics 1956 Category:1956 in Ceylon
title: Ceylon at the 1956 Summer Olympics
